params.asset: the asset one wants to lend

returns._0: true if the asset can be supplied on pool

POOL().notice: The AAVE pool retrieved from the pool provider.

checkAsset(address).notice: verifies whether an asset can be supplied on pool

overlying(address).notice: convenience function to obtain the overlying of a given asset

documentation.text:
@notice contract's constructor
@param addressesProvider address of AAVE's address provider

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (contract IERC20,struct HasAaveBalanceMemoizer.BalanceMemoizer memory) view returns (contract IERC20)

documentation.text:
@title Memoizes values for AAVE to reduce gas cost and simplify code flow.
@dev the memoizer works in the context of a single token and therefore should not be used across multiple tokens.
